last_episode_to_air.name: Phace to Phace !
last_episode_to_air.overview: The chase approaches a dramatic end, but peril lurks at every corner. The question remains: can Amit close the case, or will Chandan slip away?

name: Khakee: The Bihar Chapter
overview: As a righteous cop pursues a merciless criminal in Bihar, he finds himself navigating a deadly chase and a moral battle mired in corruption.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: As a righteous cop pursues a merciless criminal in Bihar, he finds himself navigating a deadly chase and a moral battle mired in corruption.

episodes.name: Patra Parichay !
episodes.overview: Upon arriving in Bihar, police officer Amit Lodha grapples with a tough new way of life — but when a child is kidnapped, he springs into action.

episodes.name: Chandanwa Ka Janm !
episodes.overview: Chandan Mahto’s notoriety grows after a bold move. As Amit's career advances, deep-rooted social mindsets and political pressures create hurdles.

episodes.name: Amit Kaun ???
episodes.overview: In the lead-up to state elections, violence breaks out. Amit stands up to political power but receives backlash. Chandan makes a new adversary.

episodes.name: Mooh Dikhai !!!
episodes.overview: After a bloody massacre orchestrated by Chandan, Amit is tasked with capturing the criminal — and faces a vexing road ahead.

episodes.name: Meeta Ji Ki Love Story !!!
episodes.overview: Chandan’s elusive whereabouts spark a new plan, with Amit and Ranjan using phone calls to track him. A secret tryst offers crucial clues.

episodes.name: Meeta Ji Ki Love Story Part 2
episodes.overview: Amit makes a major announcement at a press meet. Chandan sets a trap with deadly consequences, while an explosive revelation stuns the team.

episodes.name: Phace to Phace !
episodes.overview: The chase approaches a dramatic end, but peril lurks at every corner. The question remains: can Amit close the case, or will Chandan slip away?
